name: Beep (itch)
description:
Beep is a sad mech game in which you play pilots of mechs who fight in a battle, lose, and die. It is supposed to be sad, but I hope you can also find some heart in it.  It takes up to 6 players, online or face-to-face, and can be audio only. 

With the purchase of this game, you are given permission to distribute a copy to each person you play with, as it's required for the game. It's always appreciated if players come back to the page and buy a copy of their own, though!

Beep was inspired by the #sadmechjam, the loss of Opportunity, and the struggles of disability.
